resources.string: Falling Bricks is a variant of the famous Tetris Game on Nintendo Consoles. The aim of this game is to prevent the screen from filling up with falling bricks by arranging the bricks so that complete rows of brick pieces are formed (the system automatically removes those full rows and increases your score accordingly for a good work done). Use the left and right keys to shift a falling brick left or right. Use the up key to rotate bricks clockwise and the down key to make a brick fall faster. Use the back key to pause or quit the game.
Falling Bricks was developed by Aaron Baffour-Awuah. To contact me, email me at this address: aaronbaffourawuah@gmail.com .
